long_description: The Skullcandy Aviator headphones represent the brand's heavy investment into engineering and research to create headphones that transport seriously premium sound. Incredible sound is coupled with head-turning good looks-a feast for the ears and the eyes that also offers plush comfort for hours of basking in your favorite tunes. Take charge of the conversation with an inline mic when you're not enjoying the aggressive bass, natural vocals, and precision highs that deliver pure audio bliss. Soft and leathery memory foam ear pillows provide cushy comfort; high-grade materials help ensure durability and style. The Skullcandy Aviator headphones come with a travel bag that stores your assets in snug style.
short_description: The Skullcandy Aviator headphones represent the brand's heavy investment into engineering and research to create headphones that transport seriously premium sound.
